description: You can access GenWellness by tapping the GenWellness button located at the lower right hand side of the dashboard.
Tap the 'Challenges' button to see a list of all active challenges for you.
From GenWellness' main screen, tap the 'Challenges' button to see an extensive list of individual and group challenges.
Tap the 'Group' button to sort challenges by group.
Tap a specific Available Challenge within the Challenges screen to get started.
Simply select a team by tapping one of the team buttons located at the bottom.
Tap the 'Join' button to join your selected challenge. Additionally, you may add your preferred fitness trackers by tapping 'Tracker Settings'
